title: Wolfblood200$
author: Wolfblood200$
content: This matter just tire me so I say make I post am.. The way police dey worry youth for road whether you get car or not as long as say you be guy..Them don assume say you dey do yahoo.. Person no go fit drive car or use expensive things again for this country..Abeg make una help join mouth for this matter...

comments.body: I was made to understand about our dressing codes that whatever way you dress that is the way you would be address. If your dressing looks so catchy or rough in eyes then people will address you with what they see from you but if you dress a decent way despite any expensive phone you are using I don't think if police man will badge into your privacy wanting to know whom you are or not, or even seeing you to be a yahoo boy and whatever they feels. With the way I do dressed I have never come encounter with any policeman for any reason instead others will be embarrassed while they leave me to go my way because i always looks responsible.

comments.body: Anyways wetin una de Yan here make sense o becauseÂ  e get the parable way say dress the way you want people to address you. So tell me wey somebody to talk to police man wey dey vex in that manner why them no go harass am. Na una area be this wey people need to look into. Police officers na human being too so make people mind the way Dem dey talk to them too because them too na people husband's, fathers etc. Them deserve respect irrespective of the nature of their job.
